selectSql:
select 
  src.id AS id,
  src.datahora AS data_cadastro,
  (
CASE
  WHEN src.datalimite IS NULL THEN NULL
  WHEN trim(src.datalimite::text) = '' THEN NULL
  WHEN trim(src.datalimite::text) ~ '^[0-9]{8}$' THEN to_date(trim(src.datalimite::text),'YYYYMMDD')
  WHEN trim(src.datalimite::text) ~ '^[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}$' THEN (trim(src.datalimite::text))::date
  ELSE NULL
END) AS data_limite,
  src.observacao AS observacao,
  src.idmotivoacordo AS id_acordo_motivo,
  src.idsituacaoacordo AS id_acordo_situacao,
  (select f.idligacao  from acordodetalhe a join fatura f on (f.id = a.idfatura) where a.idacordo = src.id limit 1) AS id_ligacao_imovel,
  src.idusuario AS id_usuario_cadastro
FROM acordo src
insertSql:
INSERT INTO ${SCHEMA}.acordo (
    id,
    data_cadastro,
    data_limite,
    observacao,
    id_acordo_motivo,
    id_acordo_situacao,
    id_ligacao_imovel,
    id_usuario_cadastro
  )
